_header: Scots out of Berwick and Aberdeen
_description: Laurence Minot, The Battle of Bannockburn Avenged — six 6-line stanzas

BlCottGalEIX.First Lines:
Skottes out of berwik and of abirdeneAt þe bannok burn war
                    ȝe to kene…
BlCottGalEIX.Last Lines:
…he had his will at berwik wele wurth þe whileskottes
                    broght him þe kayes bot get for þaire gile
BlCottGalEIX.Note:
Now forto tell ȝow will I turn / of batayl of banocburn (rubric, by
                    scribe, f. 52rb at bottom of column immediately after 6067).
